Plugin _logging

This plugin is considered a core plugin (indicated by the underscore in its name) it should only be replaced or removed if the user knows what they are doing.

This plugin sets the logging configuration for Pyxam. The default value for logging is hardcoded but a command line option is added to allow the user to set the logging level at runtime. The plugin_loader will always load _logging first so that other Plugins can use logging in their load functions.

signature
logging config by ejrbuss: The default logging configuration for pyxam

description
Logging option description

load()
Loads the following option:
  • logging -l
    Set the logging level for pyxam
Sets logging.basicConfig with a default format and sets it to the option value.

returns plugin signature
